title: 90/32/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 January 1990 altering the adjustment aid to the Portuguese refining industry for raw sugar imported from third countries at a reduced levy for the 1989/90 marketing year into Portugal (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 January 1990
altering the adjustment aid to the Portuguese refining industry for raw sugar imported from third countries at a reduced levy for the 1989/90 marketing year into Portugal
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(90/32/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The adjustment aid provided for in the second subparagraph of Article 9 (4) (c) pf Regulation (EEC) No 1785/81 shall be increased to ECU 1,08 per 100 kilograms of sugar expressed as white sugar for the 1989/90 marketing year.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 January 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 177, 1. 7. 1981, p. 4.
(2) OJ No L 114, 27. 4. 1989, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 166, 16. 6. 1989, p. 25.
